text:
-jjiqtaM tE# dakShiNaqtO vRu#ShaqBa E#dhiq havya#H || 
indrO# jayAtiq na parA# jayAtA adhirAqjO rAja#su rAjayAti | 
viSvAq hi BUqyAH pRuta#nA aBiqShTIru#paqsadyO# namaqsyO# yathA&sa#t || 
aqsyEdEqva prari#ricE mahiqtvaM diqvaH pRu#thiqvyAH paryaqntari#kShAt | 
svaqrADindrOq damaq A viqSvagU$rtaH svaqrirama#trO vavakShEq raNA#ya || 
aqBi tvA# SUra nOnuqmO&du#gdhA iva dhEqnava#H | 
ISA#na- [  ]  45
